main event: Crew's report of an object that appeared on elevation bearing 260 degrees magnetic from the observation aircraft.
interesting points: The object resembled a small light., Only a limited amount of data was obtained regarding the distance, size, or speed of the object., The report indicated the observation occurred on April 11, 1963., The sighting's details were recorded under Project Blue Book., The type of observation was categorized as 'Ground-Visual'.
